A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So many plot holes and missing sub plots for what is basically one really\, really\, really\, long chase scene.  You learn so little about the story.  \n\nThe action was entertaining though and I enjoyed other parts of it.  If you want to zone out and watch some space explosions you will like it\, if you care about the story you will be asking questions in your seat just as I was.
